channel.title: Hey guys just need some info
channel.description: I just quit pi and move on to using a disturbed/matrix 711 ive been looking around the source i was wondering is server side cache downloading honestly a good way to handle this? I think it would use more cpu on the host, id also like to learn something else how do you use the force movement mask system on this? And well id like your opinion on this, the way your given administrator rights is handled much differently than pi and requires compilation im currently deciding wether rewriting this method or not and if i do ill make it like pi xD Thats all the info i need for now thanks in advance guys

item.title: Hey guys just need some info

Best thing you could use

GitHub

apollo-rsps/jagcached

jagcached - An open-source file server, designed for use in a massively-multiplayer online game environment.


Read the README
